list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update project metadata and clean up package references
This commit updates various metadata fields within the BulkImportSQL.csproj file, including company, product name, description, version, and configurations. In addition, the formatting of the existing package references has been standardized.

task.summary:
Add BulkImportSQL solution file
This commit introduces a new Visual Studio solution file for the BulkImportSQL project in the codebase. This includes necessary configuration for Debug and Release modes on Any CPU platform.

Add .gitignore file
This commit introduces a .gitignore file to the project in order to ignore unnecessary files and directories such as build outputs and IDE-specific files. As a result, these files and directories won't be tracked by Git, reducing unnecessary noise in the repository.

Add BulkImportSQL project file
This commit introduces a new BulkImportSQL.csproj file, setting up the project with .NET 8.0 framework, enabling implicit usings and nullability checks. It also adds package references for "cclip.net", "MySql.Data", and "Newtonsoft.Json".

Add ExitCodes enum in BulkImportSQL
The new file, ExitCodes.cs, has been added to the BulkImportSQL directory. It defines an enum ExitCodes with the values Success, InvalidArguments, and UnhandledException for program exit codes.

Add ArgumentFields struct to handle command-line arguments
This new struct, ArgumentFields, handles the fields for the command-line arguments including server and database connection properties, credentials for authentication, and parameters related to the import process such as input file, table, columns, etc. This enhancement facilitates the management and readability of command-line arguments.

Add CommandLine class for argument parsing
This commit introduces the CommandLine class to handle command line argument parsing for the BulkImportSQL application. This class handles required and optional arguments, including input file, server, database, table, username, password, columns, element, batch size, number of processes, and JSON output. It also covers error handling for invalid or missing arguments.

Add necessary workspace and project configuration files
This commit introduces new workspace and project configuration files for the BulkImportSQL project. These configurations include settings for auto generated configurations, change list manager, vcs settings, etc. in .idea/. The introduction of these files ensures necessary project settings are properly set up for every developer working on the project.

Add SQLManager class to BulkImportSQL
A new file, SQLManager.cs, has been created within the BulkImportSQL/sql directory. This file includes the definition for the SQLManager class, which currently contains a method prototype for establishing a connection to the database server.

Add new BulkImportSQL/Program.cs file
A new Program.cs file has been added under the BulkImportSQL directory. This file currently contains an empty main method and will serve as the entry point for the application.

Add BulkImportSQL run configuration
A new run configuration XML file, BulkImportSQL.run.xml, has been added for the .NET project. The configuration includes essential settings such as the executable path, working directory, and project path, allowing for an optimized runtime environment for the BulkImportSQL project.

Update workspace.xml and related configurations
This commit updates the workspace.xml file and related configurations. Changes include addition of new tasks, updating the ChangeListManager, enhancing the code highlighting settings, and removing redundant runtime configurations. The revision aims to improve the development environment setup for the BulkImportSQL project.

Add BulkImportSQL solution user settings file
The new file BulkImportSQL.sln.DotSettings.user has been added, which contains the user settings of the solution. This file contains configuration details specifically related to code inspection exclusions.

Add 'bflat' configuration to BulkImportSQL solution
A new configuration named 'bflat' for the Any CPU platform has been included in the BulkImportSQL solution. This addition is reflected in both the SolutionConfigurationPlatforms and ProjectConfigurationPlatforms sections.

Refactor Main class in BulkImportSQL
The Main function in Program.cs within the BulkImportSQL namespace has been refactored. The "cclip" namespace usage has been removed and replaced with "BulkImportSQL.cli". The Main function has also been updated to remove arguments and include the instantiation of an ArgumentFields object.

Update project metadata and clean up package references
This commit updates various metadata fields within the BulkImportSQL.csproj file, including company, product name, description, version, and configurations. In addition, the formatting of the existing package references has been standardized.
